article_title: New study on Obamacare’s impact on part-time employment may not tell full story
article_text:
So far, the Affordable Care Act—better known as Obamacare—has not led to widespread movement of full-time employees to part-time status.

The prediction was made, mostly by the law’s opponents that such a move would occur given the act’s coverage provisions and employer mandate.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Ed Silverstein
article_metadata.description: There was speculation that many companies would shift employees from full-time to part-time status to avoid the added expense.

og.description: There was speculation that many companies would shift employees from full-time to part-time status to avoid the added expense.
